H0.text: When was the first stamp, the Penny Black, issued in Britain. 1835

H1.text: When was the first stamp, the Penny Black, issued in Britain. 1837

H2.text: When was the first stamp, the Penny Black, issued in Britain. 1839

H3.text: When was the first stamp, the Penny Black, issued in Britain. 1840

A4.text: It was first issued in the United Kingdom on 1 May 1840

A5.text: The 1840 Penny Black is at the American National Postal Museum
